description: Recto has elaborate historiated initial of God enthroned, surrounded by animals, grotesques and female figures; the heading, 'AD LAUDES' is also illuminated
marks: Signature; Date signed (by artist ?) within initial: [1645 Fr. Bon
medium: Ink, gouache and gilding on parchment
title: Leaf from an Antiphonary (recto and verso)
